products.title: Vermont Mocha & Ebony Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Bring a vibe of modern opulence to your home with this vermont mocha & ebony wooden blind. The 100% basswood slats, kiln-treated and warp-resistant, are finished in a deliciously dark shade that speaks of upmarket chic. products.title: Vermont Midnight & Ebony Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
